template<typename T1, typename Alloc1, typename T2, typename Alloc2>
bool thrust::operator== ( const std::vector< T1, Alloc1 > &  lhs,
const host_vector< T2, Alloc2 > &  rhs 
) [inline]

This operator allows comparison between a std::vector & a host_vector.

Parameters:
lhs The std::vector to compare.
rhs The host_vector to compare.
Returns:
true if and only if each corresponding element in either vector equals the other; false, otherwise.

bool thrust::operator== ( const host_vector< T1, Alloc1 > &  lhs,
const host_vector< T2, Alloc2 > &  rhs 
) [inline]

This operator allows comparison between two host_vectors.

Parameters:
lhs The first host_vector to compare.
rhs The second host_vector to compare.
Returns:
true if and only if each corresponding element in either host_vector equals the other; false, otherwise.
